title: Coven | Underworld
description: Why you should read this story:#1 If you like vampires, duh!#2 If you're into reverse harem (with possible erotica menage at later date).#3 The first novel to ever have different types of vampires."An ancient race in modern timeDying in the midst of a waging war.One girl must unite all clans to survive.Separated, they shall perish.Together, they shall thrive."Coven | Underworld (Season #1)*This series is a paranormal action romance. Purchasing the entire series is highly recommended to enjoy the complete reverse harem experience.*Warning: This story has polyandry and dubious/unethical elements.
author: Stella Purple
